snippet: Italy scored twice in the opening 10 minutes, and Antonio Conte got the better of Guus Hiddink in their coaching debuts as the Netherlands, which went down to 10 men, lost, 2-0, in a friendly in Bari, Italy.
abstract: Italy defeats Netherlands, 2-0, in soccer friendly in Bani, Italy; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Italy scored twice in the opening 10 minutes, and Antonio Conte got the better of Guus Hiddink in their coaching debuts as the Netherlands, which went down to 10 men, lost, 2-0, in a friendly in Bari, Italy.

headline.main: Italy Defeats the Netherlands in a Friendly
